head.title: Ansi codes
head.intro: Quick reference to ANSI color codes.

body.title: ANSI codes
body.elms:
```
0      clear
1      bold
4      underline
5      blink

30-37  fg color
40-47  bg color

1K     clear line (to beginning of line)
2K     clear line (entire line)
2J     clear screen
0;0H   move cursor to 0;0

1A     move up 1 line
```

body.title: Colors
body.elms:
```
0      black
1      red
2      green
3      yellow
4      blue
5      magenta
6      cyan
7      white
```
